Martial Poise.name: Martial Poise
Martial Poise.blurb: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
Martial Poise.description:
Innate: Kalista's basic attacks have unique properties:
 Deals 90% AD physical damage.
  Miss if she loses  sight of her target before they hit.
 Cannot cancel their wind-up, but can select a new target within range.
 Makes her  dash in the target direction after issuing a movement command during a wind-up or right after casting  Pierce.
 The distance scales with her boots tier. The wind-up while dashing is only reduced by 0.66% per  1% bonus attack speed.
Martial Poise.description2: Innate - Oathsworn Bond: Kalista begins the game with  Black Spear, a unique item.
Martial Poise.notes:
* Black Spear can not be used on decoys. Targeting them will put the item on a 10 seconds cooldown.
 The dash speed is affected by movement speed modifiers and so it will be reduced by  Slow.
 It is not affected by  cripples.

Pierce.name: Pierce
Pierce.blurb: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
Pierce.description: Active: Kalista hurls a fast and narrow spear, dealing  physical damage to the first enemy hit.
Pierce.description2: If Pierce kills its target, the spear continues onward, transferring all of the dead victim's  Rend stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum distance.

Sentinel.name: Sentinel
Sentinel.blurb: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
Sentinel.description: Passive - Soul-Marked: While Kalista and her  Oathsworn are linked, their basic attacks and  Pierce apply a Soul-Mark to their targets.
Sentinel.description2: If both Soul-Marks are applied within 4 seconds, the target takes  bonus magic damage (capped against non-champions), and cannot be Soul-Marked for 10 seconds. Soul-Mark deals 75 minimum damage to  minions and executes them if they're below  125 health.
Sentinel.leveling2:
Bonus Magic Damage:
10 / 12 / 14 / 16 / 18% of target's maximum health
Maximum Non-Champion Damage:
100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200
Sentinel.description3: Passive: Kalista periodically stocks a Sentinel charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Sentinel.description4: Active: Kalista summons a Sentinel to  patrol along the target area.
Sentinel.notes:
* Applies  proc damage to consumed marks.
 Soul-Marked's bonus damage is credited to Kalista and will benefit from both her  magic penetration and spell effects.
 If her  Oathsworn ally scores a kill using Soul-Marked's bonus damage they will get a message stating 'Kill Secured' in place of the usual gold pop-up (the gold itself is credited to Kalista).

 The Sentinel's  sight reveal on  enemy champions is accredited for assists and potentially kills (if they die shortly after being spotted).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.blurb: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
Rend.description: Passive: Kalista's basic attacks and  Pierce each lodge a spear in the target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 254 times.
Rend.description2: Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from nearby enemies, dealing physical damage and  slowing them for 2 seconds. The damage is increased with additional spears, but with reduced efficiency. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic  monsters.
Rend.description3: Rend resets its  cooldown and refunds  mana if it kills at least one target.
Rend.description4: There must be at least one lodged spear nearby for Rend to be cast. In-flight spears at time of cast will empower to apply Rend's damage to their targets. If an empowered spear kills a target, Rend's refunds will still apply.
Rend.notes:
* Applies  spell damage in a  area of effect range.
 Rend at maximum stacks will deal a total of 2550 / 3572 / 4847 / 6375 / 8156 (+ 5069.4 / 6068.244 / 7016.994 / 7965.744 / 8914.494% AD) physical damage.
 The cooldown will not reset if the target is protected by  resurrection effects.
 If Rend is used against  Sion under the effects of  Glory in Death, the cooldown will reset even if it does not kill him.

Fate's Call.name: Fate's Call
Fate's Call.blurb: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to Launch toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
Fate's Call.description: Active: Kalista invokes her  link, retrieving her Oathsworn and carrying them in  stasis for 4 seconds.
Fate's Call.description2: Kalista's Oathsworn can emerge to a target location, stopping at the first enemy hit,  knocking up all surrounding enemies and landing themselves at their basic attack range relative to the target hit.
Fate's Call.notes:
* The target ally can choose any direction to  dash to by moving the cursor, which is guided by the range tooltip.
 Fate's Call will wait for the Oathsworn ally to finish their channels before holding them.
 The Oathsworn ally is  untargetable and  invisible so long as they remain held by Fate's Call, represented by a light over Kalista's head until they dash.
 Kalista's death does not  cancel Fate's Call.
